faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to your questions quickly

methods.question: What payment methods are accepted on the Casquette website?
methods.answer: We accept payments via Visa, MasterCard, and American Express. All transactions are secured through our Stripe payment platform. You don't need a Stripe account to make a purchase - you can pay directly with your credit card securely.

when.question: When will my purchase be charged?
when.answer:
If your card is valid and the payment is authorized by your bank, your purchase will be charged immediately after order confirmation.

You will instantly receive:
• An order confirmation email
• A detailed summary of purchased items
• Confirmation of the payment method used
• Your order number for tracking

issues.question: I can't complete my payment, what should I do?
issues.answer:
If you're experiencing payment difficulties, here's what to check:

Common verifications:
• The billing address matches your card
• The CVV code (3 digits on the back) is correct
• The card type (Visa/MasterCard/Amex) is properly selected
• Your card's expiration date is valid
• Your card limit hasn't been reached

If the problem persists after these checks, please contact us at panam.nord.est@gmail.com mentioning the error message you received.

security.question: Can I shop safely on Casquette?
security.answer:
Absolutely! Your payment security is our priority.

Casquette uses Stripe, one of the world's most secure payment platforms, trusted by millions of businesses.

Guaranteed security:
• SSL/TLS encryption for all transactions
• PCI-DSS Level 1 certification (highest banking standard)
• No banking data stored on our servers
• 3D Secure protection for enhanced security
• Your information protected by the strictest banking protocols

You don't need a Stripe account - pay directly with your card with confidence.

time.question: How long until I receive my order?
time.answer:
For in-stock products:

Processing times:
• Preparation: 1-2 business days
• Shipping Monday through Friday
• Sent via Colissimo with guaranteed 48h delivery

Estimated total time: 4-5 business days (preparation + delivery)

Note: Unforeseen circumstances may occasionally extend delivery by a day or two.

Out-of-stock products:
If your order contains an out-of-stock item, we'll contact you ASAP to:
• Offer a later delivery date
• Or provide a full refund

missing.question: I haven't received my order, what's happening?
missing.answer:
If your order hasn't arrived within 6-7 business days after shipping, here's what to do:

1. Check your tracking number
Review your package status with the number provided by email

2. Contact us
Email us at panam.nord.est@gmail.com including:
• Your order number
• The tracking number
• Your delivery address

Our commitment:
Our team will respond ASAP and launch an investigation with Colissimo to locate your package. We'll find a quick solution (reshipping or refund).

international.question: Do you ship internationally?
international.answer:
Yes! We deliver to many countries worldwide.

International shipping costs:
• Variable depending on destination country
• Average: €20
• Automatically calculated at checkout

Delivery times:
• Europe: 5-10 business days
• Rest of world: 10-20 business days

Note: Customs fees and local taxes (if applicable) are the recipient's responsibility.

tracking.question: How do I track my package?
tracking.answer:
Tracking your order is simple and transparent:

1. Shipping confirmation email
Once your order ships, you'll receive an email containing:
• Your Colissimo tracking number
• A direct link to tracking

2. Real-time tracking
Click the link or visit laposte.fr to:
• See your package location in real-time
• Know the expected delivery date
• Receive SMS notifications (optional)

Tip: Add the tracking number to your La Poste account for even easier tracking!
